parts.name: Jeep Renegade / Fiat 500X Brake Interchange
parts.description: The Jeep Renegade and Fiat 500X share the FCA 'Small Wide 4x4' platform. Brake rotors, pads, and calipers are identical between equivalent trims (e.g., Renegade Trailhawk and 500X Trekking).
specs: Parts are often cheaper when searched for as 'Fiat' parts

parts.name: Dodge Dart / Chrysler 200 Suspension
parts.description: The Dodge Dart (PF) and Chrysler 200 (UF) share the CUSW (Compact US Wide) platform, derived from the Alfa Romeo Giulietta. Many suspension components interchange, though spring rates differ.
specs: Front Struts: Physically fit, but damping varies
Sway bar end links are common failure points and interchangeable

parts.name: Jeep Cherokee (KL) Trailhawk Suspension Lift
parts.description: The Trailhawk trim of the Cherokee (KL) comes with a factory 1-inch lift compared to Sport/Latitude/Limited trims. You can swap Trailhawk struts, springs, and rear knuckles onto a non-Trailhawk for a factory lift.
specs: Trailhawk Rear Knuckles: Allow for larger tires

parts.name: Fiat 124 Spider / Mazda Miata (ND) Suspension
parts.description: The 'Fiata' (124 Spider) is built by Mazda on the ND Miata platform. Suspension arms, coilovers, sway bars, and brakes are largely interchangeable. Engines are different (Fiat 1.4T vs Mazda 2.0L).
specs: Coilovers: ND Miata coilovers fit Fiat 124
Brakes: Interchangeable (Standard vs Brembo packages exist for both)

parts.name: Dodge Journey / Avenger / Grand Caravan 3.6L Pentastar
parts.description: The 3.6L Pentastar V6 is ubiquitous across FCA. While oil pans and intake manifolds vary by vehicle (FWD vs RWD, hood clearance), the long block is largely the same. 2011-2013 heads had issues; 2014+ are updated.
specs: Oil Filter Housing: Prone to cracking, updated part fits all
Rocker Arms: Prone to failure, same part across all models

parts.name: Alfa Romeo Giulia / Stelvio 2.0T Parts
parts.description: The Giulia and Stelvio share the Giorgio platform. The 2.0L Turbo engine and ZF 8-speed transmission are identical. Maintenance parts like oil filters and belts are shared.
specs: Oil Filter: 04892339AA (Mopar part number often cheaper)

parts.name: Jeep Wrangler JL / Gladiator JT Front End
parts.description: The front clip (grille, headlights, fenders, hood) is interchangeable between the Wrangler JL and Gladiator JT. The Gladiator grille has wider mesh openings for better cooling.
specs: Headlights: Direct swap (Halogen to LED requires wiring/programming)

parts.name: Ram ProMaster / Fiat Ducato Parts
parts.description: The Ram ProMaster is a rebadged Fiat Ducato. Body panels, mirrors, and taillights are interchangeable with the European Ducato, Peugeot Boxer, and Citroen Jumper.
specs: Mirrors: Often cheaper from Euro suppliers
Headlights: DOT vs E-Code differences, but physically fit

parts.name: Neon SRT-4 Rear Brake Swap
parts.description: The rear disc brakes from a Neon SRT-4 (or 4-wheel disc Neon R/T) can be swapped onto a base model Neon (drum brakes). Requires the entire knuckle assembly and e-brake cables.

parts.name: Chrysler Pacifica AWD Shaft
parts.description: The AWD driveshaft on the Chrysler Pacifica (2004-2008 crossover, not the minivan) is a common failure point. It is specific to the CS platform but shares carrier bearing designs with other Mercedes-era Chrysler AWDs.
